name: UAMOU Invasion
description:
Based on the cover by

UAMOU / 宇宙人

Control your player with the mouse. Collect imps, avoid ghosts.

Game by ULTDEV: http://ultdev.tumblr.com/ https://twitter.com/ULTDEV
